text:
Rachel, Lady Redgrave (28 May 1910 – 24 May 2003) was an English actress. She married Sir Michael Redgrave in 1935.
Her best known roles were in the movies "The Captive Heart", "The Sea Shall Not Have Them", "The Jokers", "Two Gentlemen Sharing", "Out of Africa", "Uncle Vanya", and the television series ' (1974) and "The Jewel in the Crown".

annotations.surface_form: The Sea Shall Not Have Them
